attributes.review: i had high hopes for this app. i would had love checking in daily and making american great again, but this app is just SAD! when i started to download it i realized the app was taking a little longer to download. so after days with issues with the app, it finally downloaded. i was so excited but soon that excitement ended when i clicked on it. the app just shut down as well as my phone. i had to restart my phone all over again due to this terrible app! i do not recommended this app to anyone and itâ€™s just a huge waste of time. SAD!
attributes.title: not worth your time

attributes.review: As a POC in America I am a HUGE Trump supporter. He has done so much for POC, second only to Lincoln. I got this app because I was excited to get news straight from the Trump team and not other fake news media outlets such as CNN. Unfortunately the app took hours to download. When I opened the app it downloaded several viruses into my phone, slowing down the device tenfold. Additionally , once the app finally started to work, it was pretty much the same as the Trump 2020 website, which I frequent. Unfortunately this terrible experience might just make me switch my vote to Kanye.
attributes.title: Unfortunately, horrible

attributes.review: If 0 stars was an option, I would rate this stupid app 0 stars! absolutely horrible. horrendous. disheartening. as soon as I opened the app I was greeted with a nazi symbol and it asked me my race. when I said Iâ€™m bald black I was told to go back to africa. WOW. I am extremely disappointed in this app. absolutely disgraceful. â€œmake america great againâ€? no, make america HATE again. but to mention the app barely functions. after downloading this app my phone started acting up. showing ads for trump flags, nazi stickers , etc. absolutely extremely disappointed to say the absolute least. disgusting
